Domain PK

Card of domain PK

Name

PK

Code

type_pk

Data Type

char(32)

Mandatory

No


Code preview of the domain PK

use SCMES
go

if exists(select 1 from systypes where name='type_pk')
drop type type_pk
go

use SCMES
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Domain: type_pk */
/*==============================================================*/
create type type_pk
from char(32)
go
